metadata.description: Spells that create illusions, images, and sensory experiences

spells.name: Phantom Steed
spells.description: Creates the illusion of a magnificent horse that can actually carry a rider. The steed appears real to all senses but cannot truly interact with the world.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create moving image), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Animal requisite

spells.name: Illusion of the Perfect Palace
spells.description: Creates the illusion of a magnificent palace complete with furnishings and decorations. The illusion is convincing to all senses.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (create complex illusion), +1 Touch, +3 Moon, +3 Structure

spells.name: Disguise of the New Visage
spells.description: Creates an illusion that completely changes the target's appearance, making them look like a different person entirely.

spells.name: Invisible Eye Revealed
spells.description: Allows the caster to see things that are invisible or hidden by illusion. Reveals the true nature of visual deceptions.

spells.name: Aura of Ennobled Presence
spells.description: Makes the caster appear more noble, beautiful, and charismatic. The enhancement is subtle but noticeable to all who see them.

spells.name: False Light of the Moon
spells.description: Creates soft, moonlight-like illumination that fills an area. The light appears natural and does not hurt sensitive eyes.

spells.name: Phantasmal Army
spells.description: Creates the illusion of a large army complete with soldiers, weapons, and banners. The army appears real but cannot actually fight.
spells.guidelines: Base 25 (create large moving illusion), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +2 Group

spells.name: Silence of No Words
spells.description: Creates an area of absolute silence around the target. No sound can enter or leave the affected area.

spells.name: Scent of the Blooming Rose
spells.description: Creates a pleasant floral scent that emanates from the target. The fragrance is subtle but noticeable and long-lasting.

spells.name: Echo of the Distant Voice
spells.description: Allows the caster to send their voice to someone far away through an arcane connection. The recipient hears the voice clearly.

spells.name: Cloak of the Duck's Feathers
spells.description: Makes water and other liquids bead up and roll off the caster, keeping them completely dry even in heavy rain.

spells.name: Mirror of Deceptive Truth
spells.description: Creates a magical mirror that shows whatever image the caster desires instead of the true reflection. Useful for deception.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create false image), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for interactive illusion
